org.lenskit.data.packed

Class RatingSnapshotDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.data.packed.RatingSnapshotDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, EventDAO, ItemDAO, ItemEventDAO, UserDAO, UserEventDAO

    @Shareable
 @DefaultProvider(value=RatingSnapshotDAO.Builder.class)
public class RatingSnapshotDAO
extends Object
implements EventDAO, UserEventDAO, ItemEventDAO, UserDAO, ItemDAO, Serializable

    A DAO that has a snapshot of the rating data. This snapshot is stored in a BinaryRatingDAO.

    Since:
    2.1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Stream events grouped by item.

        Specified by:

        Stream events grouped by user.

      • streamEventsByUser

        public <E extends Event> ObjectStream<UserHistory<E>> streamEventsByUser(Class<E> type)
        Description copied from interface: UserEventDAO

        Stream events grouped by user.

        Specified by:
        streamEventsByUser in interface UserEventDAO
        Parameters:
        type - The type of item to look for.
        Returns:
        A stream of user histories, filtered to contain events of type type. If a user exists, but does not have any history, they may or may not be included depending on the DAO implementation.
